title: 114_s3233
content: The "Promoting Affordable Childcare for Everyone Act" or the "PACE Act" allows for the refundability of the Child and Dependent Care Tax Credit. The Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended to redesignate section 21 as section 36C and move it to a new location. Technical amendments are made to various sections to reflect these changes. The Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended to redesignate section 21 as section 36C and move it to a new location. Technical amendments are made to various sections to reflect these changes, such as updating references from section 21 to section 36C in multiple paragraphs and subsections. The Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended to redesignate section 21 as section 36C and make technical amendments to various sections to reflect this change. This includes inserting "36C," after "36B," in section 1324(b) of title 31, United States Code, and updating the table of sections for subpart C of part IV of subchapter A of chapter 1 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986. The Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended to redesignate section 21 as section 36C and make technical amendments. The amendments apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2016. Additionally, there is an enhancement of the child and dependent care tax credit. The Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended to increase the child and dependent care tax credit by 50 percent reduced (but not below 35 percent) for taxable years beginning after 2016. Additionally, a new subsection is added for inflation adjustment. The child and dependent care tax credit is increased by 50 percent for taxable years starting after 2016, with rounding rules for any increase not a multiple of $50. The amendments made by this section apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2016. SEC. 4. INCREASE IN EXCLUSION FOR EMPLOYER-PROVIDED DEPENDENT CARE ASSISTANCE. The Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended to increase the exclusion for employer-provided dependent care assistance to $7,500, with adjustments for inflation starting in 2018. The amendments made by this section will apply to taxable years starting after December 31, 2016, with adjustments for inflation.
